snippet: By betting big on property in a down market, and with the help of a donor network, the group is creating entire Habitat neighborhoods.
abstract: Habitat for Humanity, nonprofit housing group, has taken advantage of the depressed housing market in Portland, Ore, and with help of a large donor network, is creating entire neighborhoods; scale and scope of Habitats projects will allow entire blocks to be anchored by owner-occupied housing.
lead_paragraph: By betting big on property in a down market, and with the help of a donor network, the group is creating entire Habitat neighborhoods.

headline.seo: Habitat for Humanity Bets Big in Oregon
headline.main: Habitat for Humanity Tries Big-Scale Approach to Housing in Oregon
headline.print_headline: Habitat for Humanity Tries A Large-Scale Approach To Housing in Oregon
